column1: Taking the next 2 weeks off (precautionary coronavirus measures), we'll see how many of the 45 I can nail in 2 weeks, and then I can average that and see how long it will take to finish all of them. daily divs will boost my bags until target is hit, I got all year
I thought Coronavirus was just the mexican name for it lol
This is a warning by the ministry. That this is going to be really really bad now
